entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 27 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 27 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 50 in the evening then light after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 27 April 2016
